name: Dinner Date with Luck
description:
Instructions:

  • Left Click + Drag down to yeet the dice
  • Mouse wheel to zoom
  • Once you come to a full stop, all the objects that you have marked with the dice will be pushed. The higher your roll, the stronger the push.

Welcome to the Dinner Date with Luck. 

This game is our entry to GMTK Game Jam 2022. With the theme given we have made it so that all of us can have a smashing night, with a dice. 

The aim of the game is throw this dice around and smash thing and more importantly have fun. 

Hope you enjoy and we would love to have some feedback.
